alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 11:42AM CDT until April 23 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kenedy County in Deep South Texas... Jim Hogg County in Deep South Texas... Northeastern Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... Northeastern Starr County in Deep South Texas... Brooks County in Deep South Texas... Northwestern Willacy County in Deep South Texas... Northeastern Zapata County in Deep South Texas... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1141 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles southeast of Malaquite Beach to 6 miles east of Rachal to near Bustamante, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Armstrong, Hebbronville, Agua Nueva, Encino, Rachal, Sarita, Puerto Rico, Randado and Airport Road Addition. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata
